content: if you re someone who updates her décor with the changing seasons how about an autumn inspired piece this lovely oak leaf garland created with caron simply soft lets you accent anything from a mantle to a table make this quick project in pumpkin gold autumn maize and autumn red to welcome fall sizing leaf approx 21/2 6 cm x 5 12 5 cm garland approx 68 172 cm long yarn for model caron® simply soft™ 6 oz/170 1g 315 yds/288 m pumpkin 39765 1 ball gold 39782 1 ball autumn maize col0008 1 ball autumn red 39730 1 ball
